column3: News;Battambang: A fire burned down a KTV on February 16
column4: 2019 in Battambang town.------The police initially reported  the fires was likely caused by an electrical error in the karaoke room. Without being able to save the equipment
column6: the girls working in the club escaped safely.------The business was destroyed in the blaze
column7: and the financial damage is not yet known. ------https://kbn.news/archives/116622
